quote: I have this thing about friends and secrets. Sometimes when I meet a person I like, I tell them a secret they don't know me well enough to be told. It lets me judge their potential as a friend.
quote_letters: I HAVE THIS THING ABOUT FRIENDS AND SECRETS SOMETIMES WHEN I MEET A PERSON I LIKE I TELL THEM A SECRET THEY DONT KNOW ME WELL ENOUGH TO BE TOLD IT LETS ME JUDGE THEIR POTENTIAL AS A FRIEND
